marketing-text: Mepee ụzọ mmalite maka data COVID19. Dashboard dị elu nwere ndọtị ihe nchọgharị na nkọwa REST API zuru ezu, nke edebere n'asụsụ niile.
view-all-stats-by-country: Lelee stats niile site na obodo
name: Aha
promo-message: Emere ka ịhụnanya ❤️ site na otu a na Hoobu.com. Kwadoro njem njem ịgha ọrịa ịba ugbu a site na atụmatụ ịhazi njem ọnụ nke oge a dị egwu
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Jiri ncha na mmiri sachaa aka gị ugboro ugboro na sekọnd iri abụọ ka ịfụsịrị imi gị, kuchaa ma ọ bụ mechaa. Washingsa ahụ nke ọma bụ ụzọ kachasị dị mma iji gbuo nje.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Belata nzukọ na njem ndị na-adịghị mkpa ma chọọ ụzọ ọzọ maka ekele dị ka ịkwanye aka, ịmakụ ma ọ bụ isusu ọnụ.
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Aka nwere ike iburu nje virus ngwa ngwa ma ozugbo ọ merụrụ, aka nwere ike ibufe nje ahụ n’anya gị, imi ma ọ bụ n’ọnụ gị. Site ebe ahụ, nje nwere ike ịbanye n'ahụ gị ma mee ka ị daa ọrịa.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Kpuchie egbugbere ọnụ gị ma ọ bụ anụ ahụ kpuchie ọnụ gị na imi gị mgbe ịkwara ụkwara ma ọ bụ zee, wee tufuo anụ ahụ ejirila ya ozugbo.
general-advice-self-isolate-title: Obi ọ̀ dị gị mma? Onwe gi!
general-advice-self-isolate-description: Y’oburu na oria dika oria a gha akpachapu anya ka ihe gi ghara ime ka oria ghara ibute oria gi.
